entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 01:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries and rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
